explanation: [0-0] A man in a red short-sleeved shirt and black shorts is sitting on a stone pier by the side of the road, carrying a black backpack. There are many stone piers behind him, and a roadway next to the piers. On the roadway, there is a woman in a long-sleeved black top and beige skirt, and some vehicles. Next to the man in the red shirt is a woman in black short-sleeved shirt and shorts and white shoes. The woman in the black shirt is holding a mobile phone in her left hand. Behind the woman is a person riding an orange electric scooter wearing a beige short-sleeved shirt and black pants. Behind the man in the beige shirt is a screen with colored circles and subtitles. Many pedestrians are walking behind the screen.

[0-2] Subsequently, the camera moves to the right, and the woman in the black long-sleeved top disappears from the screen. The woman in the black short-sleeved shirt walks while looking at her mobile phone, and the man in the beige short-sleeved shirt rides forward on his electric scooter. The man in the red shirt stands up, reaches out, pulls the woman in the black short-sleeved shirt to his side, and spins her around. The man in the beige shirt passes by the woman in the black short-sleeved shirt on his electric scooter. The man in the red shirt looks at the man in the beige shirt, and the woman in the black short-sleeved shirt has a startled expression on her face. The woman in the black long-sleeved top reappears, walking on the road.

The woman in the black short-sleeved shirt shakes her head to the left and then looks at the man in the red short-sleeved shirt. The man in the beige short-sleeved shirt rides his electric scooter back to the woman in the black shirt from the side. The man in the red shirt hands a piece of paper to the man in the beige shirt. After taking the paper, the man in the beige shirt rides his electric scooter forward and disappears from the screen.
